title: Onside Sports: Scores, Live Odds & Bet Tracking
description:
The everything app for sports bettors! Sports betting odds from Vegas and online sportsbooks, everything from spreads & totals to team totals & live bets. All the live scores, breaking injury updates, proprietary betting stats, up-to-date line movements, and a community of bettors all in the palm of your hand with the #1 sports odds & live scores app! And now introducing a Bankroll Management simulation to drive better performance.  Track all your bets and analyze your performance.
The only app that has easy access to all the Vegas and online sportsbook odds on all the live games. Follow games in all the major North American leagues: NFL Football, NCAA (College) Football & NCAA (College) Basketball, MLB Baseball, NBA Basketball and NHL Hockey. Live sports scores and breaking injury updates from all the international soccer leagues like Barclay’s Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, and more. Recently added coverage for all the Latin American soccer leagues such as Liga MX, Brazilian Serie A and Argentinian Premier League.
With Onside Sports you get access to international soccer as well as American football, basketball, hockey and baseball. Get advanced stats on all the games to help you make an informed sports betting choices. In addition to having advanced stats at your fingertips, Onside is an active sports betting community where you can make picks and see predictions from a community of sports betting experts and handicappers. With tens of millions of sports picks made, it is easily the largest such community on mobile today. We are a sports only community built by sports bettors because they wanted a better experience for checking live scores and odds.
We offer:
• FREE real time scores and box scores - Live sports scores and breaking injury updates from the top sports leagues in the world: NFL Football, NCAA (College) Football & Basketball, MLB Baseball, NBA Basketball and NHL Hockey, Barclay’s Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Bundesliga Soccer,  Serie A Soccer, UEFA Champions & Europa Leagues, Liga MX, Argentine Premier Division and many more.
• FREE access to sportsbook betting odds and line moves from top Vegas and online sports books - including first half & second half lines, first five innings for baseball, live lines and much more. For soccer bettors we offer 1 X 2, asian handicaps, point spreads, over/under totals, moneylines, runlines and pucklines. The most complete set of odds outside of a sportsbook or Vegas on any mobile app.  Including real-time notifications on halftime spreads for football and basketball.
• The fastest, most accurate push notifications on scores, betting line changes and breaking injury updates. Personalize the push notifications for free in our game alerts panel and never miss a beat on any of your games.
• Vegas style pick'em pools to compete with friends across any sport based on all the real betting lines: spreads, totals, halftimes, and more.
• Follow your favorite teams from the MLB, NFL, NCAA (College) Football, NCAA (College) Basketball, NBA and NHL, Barclay’s Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, UEFA Champions & Europa Leagues, Liga MX, Argentine Premier Division, or just follow a game.
• Deep and insightful matchup stats on every game. See a detailed breakdown of all the information you need to bet on games with consensus, lines from multiple sportsbooks and team records against the lines.
• A bankroll simulation to help you analyse and increase performance.  Make virtual sports picks on any game and track your performance. Share your picks with the community and start a discussion. See other people’s picks and finds find experts and handicappers for every league and bet type. Over 50 million picks have been made!
• A sports betting community. Chat your people in the app, tweet your picks or just post your opinions on lines and games.
Try the app today! Please send us your feedback - we review all comments including new feature requests.
